org.fcrepo.client

Class BodyRequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.client.RequestBuilder
      • org.fcrepo.client.BodyRequestBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PatchBuilder, PostBuilder, PutBuilder

    public abstract class BodyRequestBuilder
extends RequestBuilder
    Request builder which includes a body component
    Author:
    bbpennel

                                  String contentType)

      • digest

        protected BodyRequestBuilder digest(String digest,
                                    String alg)
        Provide a checksum for the body of this request
        Parameters:
        digest - checksum to provide as the digest for the request body
        alg - abbreviated algorithm identifier for the type of checksum being added (for example, sha1, md5, etc)
        Returns:
        this builder
